name: Screen Pick
short_description:
Screen Pick allows you to instantly grab, edit and share screenshots with anyone. There are three simple steps involved while creating a screenshot.
1. Select area - select what you want to take a screenshot of.
2. Edit - Draw lines and blur out thinks you don't want others to see.
3. Upload - Click the upload button and your screenshot will automaticly be uploaded to a image-hosting server and a link to it will be copied to your clipboard. 
You just have to paste it to share it with anyone you want.

The tool is made to be as fast (extremely fast) and easy as possible. Everything is automatic. You only need to do stuff you want. Nothing else.
Try it out to see!

(The soruce code will be uploaded as soon as I've cleaned up the code. Right now it's really ugly. Unreadably ugly.)

Please read info.txt for info about future plans.
summary: Fast screenshot capturing and sharing tool
